sourcesContent:
import React, { useState , useEffect } from 'react' function CartArticle({ element, onSubmit, onRemove, onPlaceOrder, setTotalPrice }) { const { item : { article: { id, title, quantity: stockQuantity, price, img }} , quantity : articleQuantity } = element let result = price * articleQuantity function handleArticle(event){ event.preventDefault() const { target: { number: { value: quantity }, articleId: { value: articleId } } } = event onSubmit(articleId, quantity) } return <>
  • {title}
  • Stock: {stockQuantity}
  • Your quantity: {articleQuantity}
  • {price} € x pack
  • Total:

    {result.toFixed(2)} €

} export default CartArticle
